CustomField.description: When the checkbox is selected, then the address input seems to be a mistake. The Start and End Date of the Account Address are the same date, which appears after a correction on the address input.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Start_Date__c)), Start_Date__c = End_Date__c ), TRUE, False )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the checkbox is selected, then the address input seems to be a mistake. The Start and End Date of the Account Address are the same date, which appears after a correction on the address input.
CustomField.label: Considered as Incorrect Address Change
